headline: Why Bloom Energy (BE) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of electricity generation and hydrogen production company Bloom Energy (NYSE:BE) jumped 6.3% in the afternoon session after it continued a multi-day rally sparked by a landmark $2.65 billion agreement with American Electric Power (AEP) for its solid-oxide fuel cells.

headline: American Electric Power Earnings Preview: What to Expect
summary: American Electric Power is set to announce its fourth-quarter results soon, with analysts projecting a single-digit decline in its bottom-line figure.
